ygData.subject: RE: Large Container Lid Molds
ygData.msgSnippet: You need a Scalar Mold, Metal Bits and 1 Flask of Water to create these.
ygData.messageBody:
You need a Scalar Mold, Metal Bits and 1 Flask of Water to create these.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Michael O'Reilly [SMTP:michael@...]
> Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 3:27 PM
> To: 'EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com'
> Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Large Container Lid Molds
>
> From: Michael O'Reilly <michael@...>
>
> Hi,
>
> I had heard that making Large Container Lid Molds was a good way to get
> my skill up to 41. I was told they use the Scalar mold, but don't know
> what else to combine. Does anyone have this information?
>
> Thanks.
